column1: Marketing Spend Dataset Documentation File Name: marketing_spend.csv
1.  Overview The marketing_spend.csv file contains structured data
related to marketing expenditures across different channels over a
defined period. The dataset supports analysis of budget allocation
2.  File Structure Each row represents marketing performance data for a
Typical Columns: - Date (YYYY-MM-DD): Reporting period - TV_Spend:
Amount spent on television advertising - Radio_Spend: Amount spent on
radio advertising - Social_Media_Spend: Paid social media campaign
spend - Google_Ads_Spend: Google Ads campaign spend -
Influencer_Marketing_Spend: Influencer campaign spend - Total_Spend: Sum
of all marketing channel expenditures - Revenue: Revenue generated
during the period - Conversions: Number of completed actions (sales

column2: etc.) - Clicks: Total number of clicks generated - Impressions:

column1: 4.  Key Metrics ROI = (Revenue - Total_Spend) / Total_Spend Cost Per
Conversion = Total_Spend / Conversions Click-Through Rate = Clicks /
-   Verify Total_Spend equals sum of channel spends
6.  Business Value This dataset enables marketing performance
